title: Thermal energy transfer - initial T of two blocks

content.question: Cube <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> and Cube <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> are brought into thermal contact, as shown, but are thermally isolated from the surroundings. After a long time, the temperature of Cube <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> has decreased and the temperature of Cube <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> has increased. Which of the following correctly compares the initial temperatures <math alttext="T sub i comma X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,X</mtext></mrow></msub></math> and <math alttext="T sub i comma Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,Y</mtext></mrow></msub></math> of Cube <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> and Cube <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="T sub i comma X is less than T sub i comma Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,Y</mtext></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext=" T sub i comma X equals T sub i comma Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,Y</mtext></mrow></msub></math>

<math alttext="T sub i comma X is greater than T sub i comma Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,Y</mtext></mrow></msub></math>
The comparison cannot be made without knowing the relative sizes of the blocks.

content.answer: <math alttext="T sub i comma X is greater than T sub i comma Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,X</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mtext>,Y</mtext></mrow></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
